opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (CIV. NO. 04-1-0807 (EHH))

center.underline: ORDER REJECTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_byline:
By: MOON, C.J., for the court[fn1].
[fn1] Considered by: Moon, C.J., Levinson, Nakayama, Acoba, and Duffy, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: Petitioner William Coward's application for writ of certiorari, filed July 30, 2008, is hereby rejected.
